TriggerOraclev10g.name: COMM_MASTER_PRINT
TriggerOraclev10g.body:
DECLARE
V_SERIAL NUMBER;

BEGIN
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0)+1 INTO V_SERIAL FROM OSD.COMM_PRINT_LOCKUP
WHERE DEPT_CODE =:NEW.DEPT_CODE
AND IN_DATE_DD =:NEW.IN_DATE_DD
AND IN_DATE_MM =:NEW.IN_DATE_MM
AND IN_DATE_YY =:NEW.IN_DATE_YY;
IF :NEW.DEPARTMENT_NO ='2010208620' THEN
insert into COMM_PRINT_LOCKUP
(SERIAL_NO,PROCESS_NO, IN_DATE_DD, IN_DATE_MM, IN_DATE_YY, DEPT_CODE, DEPARTMENT_NO)
VALUES
(V_SERIAL, :NEW.PROCESS_NO, :NEW.IN_DATE_DD, :NEW.IN_DATE_MM, :NEW.IN_DATE_YY, :NEW.DEPT_CODE,:NEW.DEPARTMENT_NO) ;
END IF;


EXCEPTION
WHEN OTHERS THEN
-- Consider logging the error and then re-raise
RAISE;
END ;
